verbs.description: [V: is] the retail collapse over shopping mall owners think so bon - ton toys r us sears claire abercrombie fitch and sam club are just a few of the major retailers that have shut hundreds of locations altogether this year leaving a glut of commercial real estate on the market it allowed the few retailers that are still expanding as well as some e - tailers looking to plant some roots take advantage of the empty space and cheaper leases ceo david lukes toys r us conor flynn ross company kimco realty corporation shopping mall greg maloney ken bernstein kimco david simon
